property.name: instance.volumes
property.description: Location of Accumulo data files in HDFS.

property.name: instance.zookeeper.host
property.description: Comma-separated list of ZooKeeper server:port pairs.

property.name: tserver.memory.maps.max
property.description: Amount of memory to use for Accumulo's in-memory map, where incoming writes are sorted. If native maps are enabled (tserver.memory.maps.native.enabled) this memory is off-heap. Ensure that table.compaction.minor.logs.threshold * tserver.walog.max.size >= tserver.memory.maps.max.

property.name: tserver.memory.maps.native.enabled
property.description: Controls whether or not native maps are enabled for Accumulo's in-memory map, where incoming writes are sorted (see also tserver.memory.maps.max).

property.name: tserver.cache.data.size
property.description: Size of on-heap block cache for data blocks.

property.name: tserver.cache.index.size
property.description: Size of on-heap block cache for index blocks.

property.name: tserver.sort.buffer.size
property.description: Amount of memory to use for sorting walogs when recovering from tserver failure.

property.name: tserver.walog.max.size
property.description: Maximum size of each write-ahead log.

property.name: master.port.client
property.description: Port for client connections to the master.

property.name: trace.port.client
property.description: Port for delivering tracing data to the tracer process.

property.name: tserver.port.client
property.description: Port for client connections to the tservers.

property.name: gc.port.client
property.description: Port for monitoring the Accumulo garbage collector.

property.name: monitor.port.client
property.description: Port for the Accumulo monitor UI.

property.name: monitor.port.log4j
property.description: Port for delivering logs for aggregation by the Accumulo monitor.

property.name: trace.user
property.description: User that the tracer process uses to write tracing data to Accumulo.

property.name: general.classpaths
property.description: List of jars and directories that will be added to Accumulo's classpath. Ordering matters, as the entries will be searched in order when attempting to load a class.
